snippet: After an eventful year, the Knicks don’t look much different than they did last spring when they lost to the Celtics in the playoffs.
abstract: Howard Beck On Pro Basketball column holds that the New York Knicks do not look much different than they did a year earlier when they lost to the Boston Celtics in the first round of the NBA playoffs.
lead_paragraph: After an eventful year, the Knicks don’t look much different than they did last spring when they lost to the Celtics in the playoffs.

headline.seo: Knicks Are Back Where They Started
headline.main: Knicks Are Back Where They Started
headline.print_headline: Knicks Are Back Where They Started
